DOC.detailed_description: In-vitro fertilization ( IVF ) treatment involve development multiple follicle follow ovarian stimulation , oocyte retrieval embryo transfer ( ET ) . Despite recent advance ovarian stimulation , method assist fertilization improved culture condition , implantation potential embryo remain around 20-25 % long time . ET final crucial step IVF treatment pregnancy rate ET may affect various factor . In Cochrane meta-analysis ( Derks et al. , 2009 ) , evidence benefit find perform ET full bladder , removal cervical mucus , flush endocervical canal endometrial cavity . No data find change woman 's position , use tenaculum , performance dummy transfer , embryo afterloading . Other meta-analyses demonstrate use soft ET catheter ( Buckett , 2008 ) transabdominal ultrasound guidance ( Brown et al. , 2010 ) lead high chance clinical pregnancy compare use stiff catheter clinical touch respectively . The ET catheter pas endocervical canal go uterine cavity internal o . The endocervical canal may fill mucus blood . Embryos trap mucus blood passage endocervical canal may able implant endometrium . DOC.criteria: ( ) ET fresh cycle ( ii ) Age < 43 year ( iii ) Normal uterine cavity show ultrasound scanning ( ) Three previous IVF cycle ( ii ) Natural IVF IVM cycle ( iii ) Presence hydrosalpinx pelvic scanning ( iv ) Transfer grade 5 embryo ( v ) Blastocyst transfer ( vi ) Use donor oocyte ( vii ) Preimplantation genetic diagnosis ( viii ) Previously join study
